short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds numbers to tabs making it easier to switch to the tab using keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabularity makes it easier to switch to tabs in Chrome using your keyboard by putting the tab number in the title of the tab.  Tabs 1-8 are numbered and the last tab is labelled with a 9.  This matches the keyboard shortcuts for Chrome.
